column5: I searched the net a bit and it seems like you can use car wax for fiberglass, just wanted to see if this is correct? I don't have a fiberglass boat but the console is fiberglass.  Thx
you can  but if the fiberglass is old and pitted the wax will get stuck in there and turn white in the sun...  use the turtlewax that comes in the matching colour to avoid this
